game.name: Where Foxes 狐狸在哪里
game.shortDescription: Search for 100 foxs. A carefully hand drawn scene filled with cute characters. The process is short and won't take up too much player time. You can choose your favorite dyeing for the convenience of color blind players. Extremely easy to achieve.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Search for 100 foxs. A carefully hand drawn scene filled with cute characters. The process is short and won't take up too much player time. You can choose your favorite dyeing for the convenience of color blind players. Extremely easy to achieve.

reviewHighlights.text: This is amazing, my mood went up instantly
